title: CPAC, the Bulwark, and Political Puritanism
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: The Bulwark, an offshoot of the now-defunct Weekly Standard, evoked criticism with coverage of the Conservative Political Action Conference. We discuss tolerance for internal dissent within political parties, and how media's business dynamics shape political debate.
itunes:subtitle: The Bulwark, an offshoot of the now-defunct Weekly Standard, evoked criticism with coverage of the Conservative Political Action Conference.  We discuss tolerance for internal dissent within political parties, and how media's business dynamics shape political debate.
